ModMetaData.name: Reunion movement
ModMetaData.author: ILuvSilicon, Ogam
ModMetaData.description: This mod aims to add a new faction from the world of Arknignts with new weapons and equipment. Reunion is a violent non-state actor and Paramilitary terrorist group consisting of the Infected (those infected by Oripathy) and Infected Sympathizers (Those who aren't infected aided the infected from their own) who seeks to end all forms of discrimination and oppression in the Outer Rim colonies.
